author: Kristian M

comments.content: Looks like a beast of the photocompositor era to me. Similar: [Cirkulus](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201162259/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/itc/cirkulus_regular/).

“a beast of the photocompositor era” — Good one!  
Thank you Stephen.
Well, one might argue that it is a charming beast.
